author: Alex Michaelides
review: A masterful psychological thriller that keeps you guessing till the last page. The suspense builds with each chapter, making it impossible to put down.

author: Delia Owens
review: A beautiful and haunting story of survival and resilience, blending mystery with an exquisite narrative on the natural world.

author: Tara Westover
review: A remarkable memoir of one woman's journey from a survivalist family to earning a PhD from Cambridge. Profoundly inspiring and thought-provoking.

author: Michelle Obama
review: An intimate and honest look into the life of Michelle Obama, offering insight and wisdom on overcoming challenges and making a difference.

bookName: Sapiens: A Brief History of Humankind
author: Yuval Noah Harari
review: An enlightening exploration of human history, from the dawn of Homo sapiens to the present. Harariâ€™s insight is engaging and thought-provoking.

author: Erin Morgenstern
review: A spellbinding tale of magic and love set within an enchanting and mysterious circus. The writing is poetic and the story captivating.
